timeline.message:
Bump kafka-streams-avro-serde from 5.4.1 to 5.5.1

Bumps [kafka-streams-avro-serde](https://github.com/confluentinc/schema-registry) from 5.4.1 to 5.5.1.
- [Release notes](https://github.com/confluentinc/schema-registry/releases)
- [Commits](https://github.com/confluentinc/schema-registry/compare/v5.4.1...v5.5.1)

Signed-off-by: dependabot[bot] <support@github.com>
Checked and removed usage of deprecated APIs in code and tests

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't streams and test-utils go to 2.5.1 here as well?
timeline.author: bbejeck
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -33,7 +33,7 @@ dependencies {
     implementation "org.apache.avro:avro:1.8.2"
     implementation "org.slf4j:slf4j-simple:1.7.30"
     implementation "org.apache.kafka:kafka-streams:2.5.0"
-    implementation "io.confluent:kafka-streams-avro-serde:5.5.0"
+    implementation "io.confluent:kafka-streams-avro-serde:5.5.1"

timeline.bodyText:
This one def needs streams and test-utils to move to 2.5.1.
Fails with
517 | Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/apache/kafka/common/requests/IsolationLevel
518 | at org.apache.kafka.streams.StreamsConfig.<clinit>(StreamsConfig.java:770)
518 | at org.apache.kafka.streams.KafkaStreams.<init>(KafkaStreams.java:557)
520 | at io.confluent.developer.NamingChangelogAndRepartitionTopics.main(NamingChangelogAndRepartitionTopics.java:154)
521 | Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.apache.kafka.common.requests.IsolationLevel
522 | at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:382)
523 | at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:418)
523 | at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:352)
525 | at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:351)

There's a few more below this one, but I won't point them all out.
